articles.title: Astrophotographer captures clear image of Saturn as it makes its closest approach to Earth this year - Daily Mail
articles.description: An astrophotographer captured his clearest ever photo of Saturn from Los Angeles, USA on Sunday. The gas giant also reached its closest point to Earth this year, and was therefore at its brightest.
